content.detailedDescription: 1. where were you and what were you doing at the timeat the time i was playing with friends in the yard, the sun had long been out ofsight we were playing a game called chase.2. what made you first notice the objecti was lying on the grown on my back resting from running around the yardplaying with the other children looking up at the night sky.3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed iti thought it was a space station.4.Describe your reactions and actions during and after sighting the object.I was realy happy to see such a sight verry happy to have seen somthing sogreat. after the event even till today i am over joyed i dont know whyi feal a peace and  a, i already knew it happend befor it happend kind of thing.5.Describe the object and its actions.The huge object was as big as the state of texas i know this sounds funny butits true i would never lie beacuse i would like some help with this.Star shaped, travled from the east to the west at a verry high speed i want toadd it was not down close, it was in the heavens it passed in a spinning motioncircling the earth as best as i can remember 6 to 8 times.6. how did you lose sight of the objectit just stoped spinning across the sky and went out of sight.
content.summary: Gone from sight

content.detailedDescription: I was out walking at about 920-930pm. and was looking up at the sky trying toidentify the planets when  i saw a sphere-shaped white light traveling in astraight line across the sky from the se heading toward the nw. it seemed to bevery high as it was above the light cloud coverhowever, it was bright enough to see through the light cloud cover. thebrilliance of the light was equal to that of a bright star but it was unlike astar in that it was steady and unblinkinguntwinkling more like a planet. itseemed too bright to be a satellite and i was wondering if the internationalspace station was that bright. i dont know if the iss was over this area at thetime though. it took about a minute to cross the sky. i looked for strobinglights or redwhite flashing lights that are usually noticed on a plane but i didnot see any. i lost sight of the object when it flew over denser cloud cover andi finished my walk. i did not hear any jet airplaneengine sounds while viewingthis object.Psych duringafter event i checked other, this only means i was terribly curiousbut im always curious. so this is not unusual for me. i was also calm but again,this is not unusual for me.Cloud cover the clouds were high by my estimation but you woud have to contactthe local airport to get the altitude.
content.summary: White light traveling nw no blinking or strobing

content.detailedDescription: I saw it first while we were watching the fourth of july fireworks.  it in thedirection that the fire works were taking place, toward the northeast, and itlooked kind of like a bright red star.  i noticed it because it was brighterthan a normal star, but still dimmer than most airplanehelicopter lights iveseen.  it stayed there for about 2 to 3 minutes, then i forgot about it and wentback to watching the show.  then i looked back at that spot when i remembered itwas there, but it was gone.  i looked around and found it more toward the northhorizon now, about 35 degrees above the ground, and like before it wasnt moving. now i started watching it more closely.  it started moving slowly up in the skyand slightly toward the east, to about 40-45 degrees, then it stopped.  it wasnow somewhat close to where the fire works were.  it stayed there in the samespot for another 10 minutes or so unitl the fire works stopped.  once the showwas over, it started moving slowly toward the east again and was getting dimmer,like it was moving eastward and going up and away from us.  it kept movingeastward then started slowly pulsating, a little dimmer, a little brighter. that lasted for about 2 minutes, then it just went dim really quick anddisappeared, like it shot upward really quick.While it was stationary, a small plane flew right past it, i could not tell ifit was above or below the plane, but the plane seemed unaffected.  we did notsee it again after that.
content.summary: Red light

content.detailedDescription: This may not qualify as a ufo sighting.  i simply spotted two aircraft thatappeared to be one in hot pursuit of the other.  they may have been flyingtogether.  i saw lights flashing which would indicate that they were knownaircraft.  they were both moving unusually fast across the sky either across thescy of one in pursuit of the other.  this was probably not a ufo sighting.
content.summary: Cincinnati 070404

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my friends house through a glass door onto his back patio to havea cigarete. i sat down in a chair and lit up... as i lit up i looked up into thesky. i just noticed it because it looked like it was out of place... like itdidnt belong. at first i just thought it was some sort of stick caught on aspider web... i was thinking that maybe a spider made a web line across thistree to the building... but i realized the object was much higher up than thistree.... id say the tree was only about 20-30 feet high. so i was looking at theobject and tried to look closer... it looked like it was either rotating oremitting some kind of waves to make the illusion it was spinning. so i decidedto call my friend out to come look at this... he had no idea what it was either.We were just curious. so we were both out there when we called for his olderbrother to come out... he just blamed it on the government and went back insideafter getting a glance at it. this vertical line in the sky kind of seemed to begetting smaller as time passed... the object stayed in the exact same place. thesky was pretty blue just a few cloud formations here and there. then we bothnoticed a cloud passed the object. the object was obviously much higher than thecloud... but the whiteness of this object was so intense you could still clearlysee it through the clouds.. eventually the cloud moved and dissappeared andthats when the object started turning into a dot. the dot sat there and anothercloud formation moved below it... the dot was still visible... then gray cloudscame in and as soon as the gray clouds passed it... it was gone.
content.summary: Saw white line rotating and slowly dissappeared
Crafts over denver caught on webcams 7204

content.detailedDescription: Hi my name is samantha and im reporting this on behalf of a lady mrs. roshnienaidu.  she saw the object at around 4am sunday morning.  her husband has thegood sense to video the object which she says looked like a huge fireball in thesky which had pulsating lights and blue and purple tones filtering through. they are happy to send you the copy of the video tape and i will leave hercontact number belowroshie naidu - 031 5004025should you need me to get any information for mufon from mrs naidu, please feelfree to ask.  im happy to assist in any way possible.Samantha rorich - 031 7622053mrs. naidu feels that she would dearly love to now just what it is that her andher husband saw.  she also knows of a third witness that saw what she did andwould be able to give you those details.
content.summary: Sighting of large pulsating fireball in the sky in

content.detailedDescription: 1. just came into my bedroom. all lights off to go to bed. walking by thewindow. 2. stranger than usual lights outside. 3. exactly what i came here totell you. a ufo. 4. stared at it. seemed to notice that i was watching it. likeit could feel my presence. felt a tingle go through my right arm. felt verycalm. even to this day i can hardly become afraid of things. 5. teardrop shaped.Black body, silver top with yellow light at tip. row of lights toward the base.Green and blue lights. rotated around the object. it hovered. then shot a yellowstream of light that went to the right of my house. then the object shotstraight up breaking off a branch of my tree which is still noticable. 6. shotstraight up and out of sight. think abductions have taken place after this. havenot told parents because i do not want them to think i am crazy. or to worryabout me.
content.summary: Teardrop ufo in local iowa neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was at my grade 8 grad. evereybody was waiting outside for the dance to beset up, it was dark and windy, no clouds2. saw light is sky,then i got a bit of a headache from nowhere3.A plane4.I wached it to the end and tried to tell my friends, but they didnt seem tocare5.It was extremely bright at first, but got smaller and dimmer as it moved itgave me a headache when i looked at it. and ever since, i have consistantly beenhaving that being wached feeling.6.It slowley disappeared. no other witnesses known
content.summary: Strange lights - feel like im beeing wached

content.detailedDescription: My partner, family and i were returning to toronto from a day up north.About this time noted above, we were returning south on the stretch of highway11 just after bradford, a few moments past the holland river bridge. i wassitting in the passenger seat, enjoying a somewhat clear night sky when i caughta glimpse of 3 orange-bronze comet-head-like type objects stream in the skydirectly to the right of me.  they then became obscured by a ridge of trees.  itold my partner and we drove until the next small clear area on hwy 11 maybe5-10 seconds up the road, whereupon i lowered my window and my partner jumpedout of the car to observe the objects yet surprisingly once again as theyemerged from the tree line -- in a se absolutely straight as an arrow formation. all three visibly equidistant to each other in formation and speed, their tailsstraight and narrow like pencil lines drawn behind them and not dissipating. weestimate the tails to be at least two to three fingers span.  the middle objectshead was brighter and larger than the two others each flanking the larger oneand a bit back.  overall altitude and speed indeterminate but we were surprisedto see them emerge from the tree line once we found a clear area.  we lost sightof them again as they passed into another tree line.   because of the shape,colour, speed, surmised low altitude and very precision flight pathequidistantspacing of these objects, we do not believe they to be part of any tri-satelliteformation one may see from time to time in the nightsky, nor a meteor cluster.Many thanks and good luck with your continued research.
content.summary: 3 orangebronze comet-head like objects toronto ont

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 200am monday, june 28, 2004. my boyfriend, pete and i wereparked on the side of a golf course in coram, ny. it was a very clear night andwe were just looking at the stars in the sky. we were able to point out the bigdipper and little dipper in the sky. to the left of the big dipper was what wethought a very large and bright star. it was twinkling very fast compared toother stars in the sky. it looked as though it was slightly moving. we figuredthat our eyes where not focusing and that was causing it to appear to be moving.We then took our focus off that one bigger star and was looking west of thereand there were star like objects that appeared to be fading in and out. twospecifically that were obvious. approximately 30 minutes later i again lookedback to the original star that was so bright and it had moved significantly tothe east of were it was originally. when i first saw the light i had my headrested upwards hanging outside the car door to see it and it was west of myposition. it now was in view of my sitting up straight and looking to my rightout the window more east of our vehicle.  i sensed a feeling of fear because itwas so evident that this star like object had moved. over the next hour we bothfocused our attention to this one star like object. it made random movements andwas blinking different colors. the color we were clear about were white, greenand red. it mainly stayed white but did randomly flash in a non specificpattern. it did however seem to blink spastically when an airplane had gone by,almost like it was trying to mimic the red blinking lights we see on air planes.It also appeared to have become bigger then when we originally saw it. we arenot sure if it came closer to our view or whatnot. it also seemed to hover in azig zag motion but very slightly. it would go from left to right or up a littleand then back down. as time went on it was eventually making its way furthereast and downward towards the treeline. we hear no noise, except noticed a dogbarking coming from the direction of the trees.  the last 5 minutes in our viewseemed to have the most significant motion as it moved downward past thetreeline and out of view pretty fast. we got out of the car to see if we couldstill see it. it was just lower than the tree line and we were able to stillmake it out. finally out of view we got back in the car. we continued to keepand eye on the area
content.summary: Saw lights hovering for hours and then moving away

content.detailedDescription: We were packing it up for the night and i took a glance out the window to checkif the anyone was outside and saw and odd object. it didnt flicker like anairplane and looked very flat with no wings. i thought the object was a unmarkedmillitary plane, no plane looks like that. the object moved from the north tosouth swiftly. it darted unlike an airplane in small course changes. it wastriangular in shape with a orange_yellow glow. it moved in the sky for about 45degrees. the object has left our view by dimming out. after it has dimmed to areddish_orange it was still visible, it was an extremly dim red object. we lostsight of it as it passed over houses. the object was banking left and right butnot banking to steer. it aimed its nose up and down like a hull of a boat for afew seconds. during a bank it expised its bottom which had three yellow oragelights in a equalateral triangular pattern. at its altitude compared to anreconizable airplane near it which may have tried to avoid it due to a massivecourse alteration. it was at 10,000 - 25,000 feet. i would like any informationabout this craft e-mailed to me if that is possible.
content.summary: Orange triangular ufo

content.detailedDescription: One morning on the way to the school where she works, my grandmother, uponpulling onto a main road took notice of a conspicuous, unnatural white sphere inthe sky. living in a largely sparse and unpopulated area, she proceeded to takethe normal route every morning around 500 a.M. to work. the object, she noticed,was following her. it followed her for 8 solid miles she knew it was noconventional aircraft, as it followed her at approximately 100 feet and againshe emphasises the feeling of uneasiness. she never concluded that it was anyform of a conventional aircraft, as no effects concerning them applied to thisevent. she kept looking over her shoulder during the drive, waiting in unusualanticipation for something to happen. the object was entirely silent - it madeno mechanical sounds whatsoever. nothing was emitted from the object, the hazemight have been emitted from the craft, but from the time she first noticed itthe mist accompanied the object. my grandmother describes the object as abrilliantly bright white sphere. she observed a haze or mist surrounding theobject - and kept looking over her shoulder in fear and anticipation. she knewand felt that this was most certainly not commonplace, and it was not supposedto be there. after finally making it to work on time which i must point outthere was no case of missing time she got out of her car and glimpsed at theobject that now stopped and hovered in position. she entered the building andafter work it was gone. she is still uneasy about the event. she is anhonourable lady and does not take the matter lightly. she is no liar. there areonly so many possible explanations.
content.summary: Unnatural light follows car for 8 miles

content.detailedDescription: Ok then...Sitting on back verandah that is directly next to a gold courseno roadetc inbetween with a friend...Ok we were drinking but we definetly had fullcontrol of our senses...Theres some trees on this course of course the distanceof the width of a gold fairway...These trees are about 20 storeys high yesbig....And the event ocurred above these...Not directly above but above inrelation to our line of sight in wich we were looking se for the entire periodof the event..There where two clouds cumulous one was like the letter l shape but lying downif you rotated the l 90degrees anti-clockwise with the bottom of the l beingquite short...The other another standard cigar shaped cloud but a bit larger andon the right side of the first...Liie this     ----5e   -----------i was actually thinking about ufos at the time, and had discussed them with theother witness before, but we were not talking about them previous to thesighting...I was actually thinking wouldnt it be nice if a ufo just came up andflew along the top of the first couldskimming the surface if you will in regardsof line of sightand then trace the last hump of the cloud thus changingdirecions and clearing up any disbelief i might have of the phenomina...And thenalond from the more eastern side left a disc shaped dark gun metal grey objectflew towards our right at a pace probably three times the speed of a 747 at thesame distance, and skimmed the surface of the cloudre line of sightand thentraced the remainder of the cloud until it got to the right hand w side and flewbehind the cloud. i was watching carefully and as the object flew e w in and outfrom behind the right side if the could i notified my fried to get up and look.This was suprisingly easy and the words that i used to describe the clound andobject position came out easy and he saw it immediately..Then we just watchedand i after a short periodyour gonna luagh actually held up my beer and said bagit up do some space doughnuts referring to slang that you would use yelling atsomeone driving a car and asking them to do a burnout...The object then contiuedto duck in and out of the cloud for about 10 secs up an down too like a clamerversion of a fly..Until it accelerrated in the exact same direction as it wasfirst travveling towards the second cloud...Slow faster faster like a perfectversion of acceleration3e3e until it got infront of the second cloudso inside atmosphere for sure andthen a bright flash of brilliant perfect white like a star in the day...Coveredthe whole object and it expand
content.summary: White lite reacting to thoughts with witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: At the above date, time and location i observed a comet like fireball travellingfrom south to northeast, at a rate of speed that i would estimate as slightlyunder mach 1. it had brilliant white and edish orange color with some blue mixedin. it was overcast est @750 to 1000 ft ceiling and the object came under thecover for @ 10 seconds then disappeared into the clouds. in addition it sporteda comet like tail that extended @ 15 times the size of the ball.
content.summary: Austin tx, fire ball

content.detailedDescription: I saw what i thought was a group of airplanes. the one in front was larger thanthe others. behind it and in a semi-tight group i counted 8 smaller. they allglowed bright and i could see a solid contrail from all. these moved very fast,maybe four times as fast as every other plane i see flying. they were alsofairly low, maybe a half mile high. there was absolutely no noise from any ofthem. i what planes every night and there were a lot of them in the sky tonight.Someone had to see these. they traveled in a perfect path from one side of thehorizon to the other.
content.summary: Very fast planes, one bigger than the other 8, wit

content.detailedDescription: A number of parallel tracked entities in the sky similar to meteors but at aslower speed travesed the sky above us while we watched with amazement.  thisseemed to be a ufo phenomenon, sine there were multiple entities and moved in amanner slower and not similar to meteors shooting stars.
content.summary: Multiple high tracking sightings in michigan

content.detailedDescription: A group of high altitude objects flying north-north east approximately threedegrees north of, and parallel to, the constellation of cassiopia. these objectswere flying in a consistent triangular formation for the entire observationalperiod. there was no sound, nor contrails. the formation was tight. i observedthe objects through binoculars, as i was doing some late night star gazing. theform or outline of the objects could not be ascertained, however appeared tohave the magnitude of about a 3rd magnitude star.
content.summary: Group of orange lights 311am 3 degrees n of cassio

content.detailedDescription: Approx. dec. 1st 2001 a heavily advertised meteor shower was to happen with itsgreatest show at approx. 0200am from the east.  i stayed up for event and it wasindeed a spectacle.  as i viewed the show i noticed to the northeast astationary extremely bright star or planet.  it was so bright that i wonderedwhat planet it could be this time or year.  i braced myself against the cornerof my house and took a picture of it with my digital camera with a telephotolens at the maximum.  when i viewed the image it didnt really present changefrom the way i viewed it with the naked eye.  so, i decided to download to mycomputer and then digitally magnify it.  as i magnified it started taking on ashape up 200x before it became distorted.  it definitely was metallic and wassaucer shape.  it appears that a light is on top but may be a reflection of thesun.  i thought maybe this could be a satellite but it remained stationary anddidnt move for approx. 2 hours.  i, like most people didnt report it because ofthe possible stigmas attached to the person reporting such things.  i feelthough that it is an important picture for those concerned.
content.summary: Sighting of object during meteor shower

content.detailedDescription: Went to go cut my frontyard there is a round spot on the ground look likesomething landed  so i cut my grass thin went out there was stuff on the grass ihave not cut grass itlookslike fungus in round spotabout three to four feetwould like some what it was what heated or landedin my yard what is on the grassi have the ash like stuff like just under the grass line ihave not cut grass yet
content.summary: Something landed in my frontyard have prof

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with my co-worker down a country road. i was telling her aboutstars and space. and trying to find the dipper.She pointed out a planet that wasbrighter than the stars.I thought i saw a second planet. but we noticed it wasmoving slowly.I asked her if she noticed it.The planet she pointed out was inthe south.What we were seeing moved was in the north. at first it looked still,but was moving barlely. then started to move fast like a burning out star. butinstead of burning out. it became closer like in the atmosphere.It stillresembled a star. but was flying quick and then stopped in the middle of thesky. it was traveling east to west. after it stopped we were amazed of what itcould be. lyndsay was a little scared. it flew up towards space until itdisapeared and then came back. it was lower this time lower than a jetliner. itshined a bright like reflection so bright it almost seemed like it was spottingus out with this shining light.But not a spot light.The shine didnt last morethan 2 seconds.It was still moving back and forth in the sky and doing circlesor ovals, until it flew straight up again. and we couldnt see it. we waited agood 10 minutes. to see if it would come back. i wanted to stay all night. imfrom terre haute and dont drive. i will get photographs and video tape it again.Im positive it will come back. because when we talked about it. we werent thefirst.And it has been spotted on different days by other people.The sky wasclear. but light clouds started covering up the sky slowly.And partly.And thedate was a guess it could have been around that week.
content.summary: It looked like a really bright star or planet.

content.detailedDescription: On the above datetime i was on duty as a deputy sheriffa position i have held for over 5 years.My assignment for the date in questionwas to observe the local high school as some students, late in the evening, havevandalized the school-pranks etc. i was given a pair of night-vision equipmentfor darkness observation. these were not night-vision goggles but rather like apair of binoculars. while sitting in my patrol car at one point, i was lookingat the stars through these.  if you are familiar with night-vision equipment itaccentuates any light and casts a rather  greenish  hue to the area you areobserving.  when looking at a clear night sky the brightness amplification ofthe stars is amazing-even in our hazy part of the country. i would say that youcan see 3 times as many stars as with the naked eye.  in any event, at a pointwhere i was in the vehicle looking up out of the driver-side open window, iobserved a dark object moving from west to east, absolutely silently. although ionly observed it for a few sconds, i could clearly make out its shape, althoughit is hard to describe verbally. i will try this dark shape had 90 degree anglesexclusively i.E., take an envelope business size layed on a table and then placeanother similar sized envelope across it, and slightly forward of center,perpendicular to one another.  if this can be comprehended,this approximateswhat i observed.  there are several points i need to clarify for you.  thisnight vision equipment does not magnify as binoculars would so it cannot makesomething look larger. secondly, the passing of the object was absolutelysilent. thirdly, the object had no lights as the night vision would have shownthis clearly. remember the stars in the background were very bright through thenight-vision. as a footnote, i do not believe in extraterrestrials, alienabductions and the like.  i spent 25 years as a professional pilot, mainly incalifornia, and have never seen anything i could not immediately explain.Something to keep in mind about this though. since the night-vision equipmentwas not magnifying and the object appeared about the size of an aspirin held atarms length, i would say that in comparison of size the size of this objectwould approximate the size of say a dc-9 or b-737 at maybe 10,000 ft. altitude. i hope this info will be of assistance to you.
content.summary: Ufo observed with night vision technology

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard at aprox 1100 p.M. saturday just lying back andlooking up at stars and the odd satalite passing over. the object just came intosight over the treeline in our backyard and my first impression was that it wasa flock of geese going over. the thing that got me moving ot of my chair was thespeed at witch it was travelling and if it was geese they wernt flapping thierwings , also they seemed to be giving off reflected light that looked like analuminum color. i ran to the side of my house to follow it and get a better lookand watched it go at a high rate of speed in a straight line towards thenorthshore mountains. i did get a better look at this time and saw that therewas an outer shape that was darker and i could make out a boomarang shape. itmade no sound whatsoever and their were no bright lights on it at all. it tookonly a matter of about 6-8 seconds to cross over that all i said to my wife wheni sat back down was what the hell was that. she had seen nothing but was curiousas to my sudden trip to the side of the house. the only thing i can add is thatwhatever it was it appeared that it was trying not to be seen.
content.summary: Boomerang shape with refective like wing shaped pa

content.detailedDescription: Cydonia experimentsdiscovery of nanobacteriamicrobiologists dyingregma biotechnologies ltdvector state scientific center of virology and biotechnologyphobos 2 a.S. selivanov and u.M. gektinufo incident in novosibirskthey have started
content.summary: They have started

content.detailedDescription: 1. outside front door.2. i usally look up at the sky at night when i walked the dogs. i saw themshining through some light clouds as they moved.3. i dont know what it was.4. i continued walking my dogs.5. they were circular and glowing and they moved in the a  anything else wasblocked off by trees. all i saw was the arc-shaped movement.6. the trees got in the way. they were far away and very high up. there are alot of trees where i live.
content.summary: Abstract

content.detailedDescription: Im a student of the ufo phenomenon but as of 33 years in this world i had neverseen anything until tonight.  my background hobbies are astonomy and militaryaviation and flight simulation etc.  ive seen everything most people see in thenight sky form satellites, bolides, meteors, shooting stars and aircraft ofevery type including the stealth fighter.Tonight my girlfriend and i saw something amazing. it was almost as if we bothwished it to happen, and it did.  we both believe in ufos but have never seenone.. we both always wanted to see one.  she at first saw a light moving.. icouldnt because my eyesight is not that great.  i said she was nuts so i went otget the binoculars.  we went into the back yard where it was clearer to see.  itwas the first good night to see the stars.  again she saw another light crossingthe northern cross and i got teh binocs up and saw it  it moved in a straightline and then dissapeared.I told her jokingly to wish or to talk to the aliens and send a mental wish as ajoke for them to come back.  3 mins later we saw 4 lights i only saw 3 2 ofwhich were converging together.. all at a high rate of speed moving from thesouthern tip of the northern cross towards the north.. they were reddish incolor glowing and then turned rapidly like.. insanely ive never seen anythingmove like this before.  it was just like sighting ive seen on tvi am still pinching myself.  we were both elated beyond belief.  i was alwaysteh scully in the relationship.. but now i have finally seen something i cannotexplain.. it almost validates everything ive read and other people who i thoughtwere probably nuts  wow i dont think im going to sleep tonight
content.summary: 4 fast moving lights in formation, then changing d

content.detailedDescription: I first noticed these consistant weird lights in the banning,beaumont area insouthern california,and so i followed my instincts.I was led down a old roadsouthward on highland springs ave...Until it was in the middle of the sanjacinto mountain range.It was in the middle of nowhere,or so i thoughti stoppedat what i thought was a old shut down military bomb testing facility,but,i wasvery wrongit had cattle gates,and a warning sign posted...Trespassers will beshot beyond this point.The sign read lockheedmartin.I thought that was weird fora place as remote as this.So my curiosity increased.It was dark,bout 730 pm thisnite,and so i just sat parked at the gate,to the side,watching and waiting tosee what would happen.As i sat there for about 15 minutes,i noticed many head ofcattle behind the security gates,and that really struck me as odd.I mean,whatwould lockheed need with cattle on the premisesalso,i noticed what appeared tobe either motion detectors,and or sound detectors nestled over in the ruggedmountain side,and rocks...Off to the sides of the cattle gates.So,at thispoint,i didnt dare get out of my van,as i was starting to get scared.Many,manygovernment vehicles like,limosines,hummers,and jeeps were back and forth intothis seemingly covert installation.All these vehicles had black tintedwindows..W gov. plates.I did see a couple military jeeps on the grounds.Prettyactive for a supposed shutdown base..,ehfinally,at about 800 that night,ithappenedthe lights appeared from the darn mountain or somethingalmost like theground or mountain side opened and the craft was just therei observed this craftmove every direction in miliseconds seeminglyfunny part is,it see
content.summary: Mini area 51...In southern california...

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was sitting in my van that i had just started, in a large parking lot onbase.2.As i was reaching for my glove box to get a cassette tape.3.I thought it was a uh-1 or ch-47 helicopter.4.I shut off my van got out of if and walked towards the ufo,it was hoveringover a supply and adminstration building.I was shocked to see that it was not amilitary aircraft and that this ufo was descending on top of this building.I wasapprox 30-40 feet from the craft it was quite no sound no wind.As i got to wherei was with the 30 feet or so it can to a hover and remained motionless for a fewminutes and then drifted north towards denver.Just to let you know during thatnight there were numerous ufo sightings that were reported that night.Also i wasstationed on a u.S.Army installation which sits adjacent to norad.6.When it got out of my vision through the cover of darkness.
content.summary: Dark skyies

content.detailedDescription: 1. i was delivering milk driving along the a52 from grantham to bottesford2. i noticed a street lamp that seemed to be out of place as i was travellingdown the road3. i thought it was a street lamp that had been hit4. as i got nearer to where the street lamp should have been, it kept alomst thesame distance away from my line of vision. as i still could see the object itried to keep it in sight until i lost sight of it as i entered the village ofbottesford in nottinghamshire and wondered why a plane or helicopter would beflying that low. after i went through the village to my first delivery point, inoticed the object hovering above a field.5. when i saw the object, i stopped my engine and watched an orange ovalhovering underneath a bank of fog which i thought was strange as i could seestreet lights on the horizon which would have come from either bingham ornottingham as there were no clouds visible. there was no defined outline to theoval as it seemed to be fuzzy but there were black markings on the oval as itspun from bottom to top.6. after watching the object for about 5 minutes, it slowly moved up into themist and vanishedi then went to make my first delivery and when i returned about 5-7 minuteslater, nothing was visible over the field, no mist or light.
content.summary: Orange oval

content.detailedDescription: 1i was returning back to my job in master control night shift at a local tvstation from my lunch hour. i cant remember the exact month only that it wasalready well dark by that time which was 730-800pm. i was driving a stretch ofrural road about 10 miles from my houserural back into town to the tv station.2looking out the drivers window toward the front of the car i noticed about50-60 degrees in the western sky an orange diamond. it was a perfect shade oforange with no flame or pulse whatsoever. just an orange diamond sitting up inthe sky. however the edges of the diamond were not sharp points but slightlyrounded so it had a smooth symmetrical shape to it. it wasnt small either so iknow other people had to see it. it was easily bigger than venus on its biggestnight. i submitted that it was the size of an aspirin held at arms length, butit may have been a little bigger. no matter the size it was the perfect orangediamond shape that attracted my attention to it, and how big it was in the sky.3 at first i thought it might be the afterburner of some type of jet aircraftbut with the diamond shape and the size i thought to myself it would have to bethe back end of the space shuttle to be that size as this looked more like 4engines inside a diamond configuration as compared to a fighter jet with justthe one exhaust port in the rear for the afterburner. remember, at the angle onthe horizon, this thing wasnt very high up in altitude at all. it wasnt like itwas directly over my head at 35,000 feet, it was on an angle on the horizon sothe altitude wasnt all that high i guess. also, no flame yellow indication, nojagged edges, no pulsing, just an deep orange diamond sitting in the sky. inever felt like it was an aircraft.4actually i was rather calm and was just watching it as there was no othertraffic on the road. i watched it for about 2 minutes straight, maybe more as icovered a couple of miles while observing the object. i still have a strongmental picture of everything that happened because i was able to watch itwithout distraction for so long. after the sighting i was a little blown awayand thought maybe i had witnessed a super nova since that what seemed to occurwhich ill get to in the next part.5the object was a deep orange colored diamond sitting in the sky. i watched itfor a couple of minutes and if it was moving at all i couldnt pick up on it as iwas traveling about 50 mph in my car. ok, so im watching this big orange diamondin the sky for several minutes the suddenly it pulses yellow and collapses intonothing...Poof...Gone. it was awesome. i say pulsed because there
content.summary: Orange diamond
